text: @realDonaldTrump Can’t wait for the next White House Coronavirus Press Briefing. Will it be another advertisement for the new tRUMP Medical Center where you can get your Clorox enema. Opening soon! And the sign and logo are going to be amazing. “tRUMP Enemas Here. Call for Opening.” Free sarcasm.
